parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering tie rod can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side
the tie rod ball stud shears off

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pulley can cause loss of power steering assist, leading to increased steering effort and potential loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering pulley comes off

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay or unavailability of recall repairs can leave vehicles with potentially hazardous conditions on the road, putting drivers and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The dealer advises that the necessary parts are not available
the manufacturer is unable to provide a reasonable timeframe for the repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the ball joint can cause the front end of the vehicle to collapse, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front end of the vehicle suddenly falls or sags
the vehicle is unsafe to drive
the ball joint is worn or damaged at a low mileage
the tire is damaged due to ball joint failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed or Unavailable Repair Parts for Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of repair parts for recall repairs can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition for an extended period, putting drivers and passengers at risk.
symptoms: Long wait times for repair parts
inability to repair vehicle due to part unavailability
fear of driving the vehicle due to safety concerns.
